sentence: Daily Kos Stories It looks like Madison Cawthorn tried to get on plane with a loaded gun Daily Kos, Walter Einenkel, 4/26/2022 On Tuesday, WSOC-TV Channel 9 reported that three sources tell them Rep. Madison Cawthorn was cited for having a gun at Charlotte Douglas International Airport Tuesday morning.? The outlet says that they were given a photo that shows a loaded Staccato C2,? a 9 mm handgun that was taken away from Cawthorn during a TSA check inside of Charlotte Douglas International Airport.
title: North Carolina Open Thread: Wealthy candidates flood primaries, Military families, Cawthorn
